name: Paper Loop
description:
Paper Loop is not really a game made by one person in 28 hours.

In this game you have to deliver the mail to all your neighbors of pyjama city (yellow square).

You also have to pickup mail (green square) and deliver it immediately (new yellow square appears).

How to play:
  • Drag and drop (left mouse click) one of the four points to modify the movement loop.
Objectives: Be efficient
  • in travel distance
  • in time
  • in interaction

There is three level with an increase of complexity and some randomness.
